about_the_game:
StarSim: BattleZone is a real-time strategy (RTS) game set in the StarSim universe.

Gameplay includes classic RTS mechanics such as: building a base, gathering resources, researching new technologies, building defences, training units, etc.

You will command forces of Home Ascolate to take the control of un-inhabited planets with rich resouces.

Campaign contain story-driven missions that show conflict between Home Ascolate and other factions.

The game also includes a skirmish mode where players can set up and play custom battles on the various maps with enemies in different situations.
